member.name: T:logview4net.Controls.AdvRichTextBox
member.summary: Represents a standard with some minor added functionality.
member.remarks: AdvRichTextBox provides methods to maintain performance while it is being updated. Additional formatting features have also been added.

member.name: M:logview4net.Controls.AdvRichTextBox.BeginUpdate
member.summary: Maintains performance while updating.

remarks.para: It is recommended to call this method before doing any major updates that you do not wish the user to see. Remember to call EndUpdate when you are finished with the update. Nested calls are supported.
Calling this method will prevent redrawing. It will also setup the event mask of the underlying richedit control so that no events are sent.

member.name: M:logview4net.Controls.AdvRichTextBox.EndUpdate
member.summary: Resumes drawing and event handling.
member.remarks: This method should be called every time a call is made made to BeginUpdate. It resets the event mask to it's original value and enables redrawing of the control.

member.name: P:logview4net.Controls.AdvRichTextBox.SelectionAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the alignment to apply to the current selection or insertion point.

member.summary: This member overrides .OnHandleCreated.

member.name: T:logview4net.Viewers.ActionTypes
member.summary: These are the types of actions that the viewers should handle. New items MUST be inserted in priority order.

member.name: F:logview4net.Viewers.ActionTypes.StartIgnoreBlock
member.summary: Ignores all events until an EndIgnoreBlock Event

member.name: F:logview4net.Viewers.ActionTypes.EndIgnoreBlock
member.summary: Ends an ignore block

member.name: F:logview4net.Viewers.ActionTypes.Ignore
member.summary: Hide an event with this action

member.name: F:logview4net.Viewers.ActionTypes.Highlight
member.summary: Highlight an event with this action. The actions should have a color if its of this type.

member.name: F:logview4net.Viewers.ActionTypes.HighlightMatch
member.summary: Changes color on matching text in the event message.

member.name: F:logview4net.Viewers.ActionTypes.PopUp
member.summary: Show a message box with the event message.

member.name: F:logview4net.Viewers.ActionTypes.PlaySound
member.summary: Plays a sound when there is a match.

member.name: F:logview4net.Viewers.ActionTypes.Hide
member.summary: Stores a message in a cache that can be shown later, but doesn't display it right away.

member.name: F:logview4net.Viewers.ActionTypes.Execute
member.summary: Executes whatever commandline is in the action config

member.name: F:logview4net.Viewers.ActionTypes.IgnoreNoMatch
member.summary: Ignores all messages that are not matched by an action

member.name: T:logview4net.Viewers.Action
member.summary: An Action is what the viewer should do with the event that matches 'Pattern'

member.name: F:logview4net.Viewers.Action.HideCache
member.summary: This is the cache of hidden messages.
